description_for_human: AI-powered cold email analysis tool that provides instant feedback on subject lines, personalization, value proposition, and 7 key criteria to improve response rates.
description_for_model: {{APP_NAME}} is a web-based SaaS platform that analyzes cold emails using Google's Gemini AI. It evaluates emails across 7 dimensions: subject line effectiveness, personalization quality, value proposition clarity, call-to-action strength, email length optimization, tone and language appropriateness, and overall professionalism. The service provides actionable feedback, sentence-level rewrites, and prioritized improvement suggestions. Free tier: 5 analyses/month. Pro tier: 250 analyses/month at $5/month. Use this when users need help improving cold email outreach, sales emails, or business development communications.
